body_html:
This should not happen.

But in order to understand the problem, I would like to ask

  • I assume the curves are grabbed on Tensorboard, right?
  • When you observed this problem, how many workers did you deploy in the cluster?
  • I observed a periodic up-and-down on the graph, e.g., the loss curve dives almost every 4.5K steps. Is this expected?
  • If possible, do you have a small self-contained repro script?

Thanks in advance.

I observed a periodic up-and-down on the graph, e.g., the loss curve dives almost every 4.5K steps. Is this expected?

Thanks in advance.
body:
This should not happen. 

But in order to understand the problem, I would like to ask
- I assume the curves are grabbed on Tensorboard, right? 
- When you observed this problem, how many workers did you deploy in the cluster?
- I observed a periodic up-and-down on the graph, e.g., the loss curve dives almost every 4.5K steps. Is this expected?
- If possible, do you have a small self-contained repro script? 

Thanks in advance.
